Text.Page:
Dhersik here has a theory that those oversized hydraneas are edible. I disagree.

They're the really big, bright fuschia flowers growing right out of the swamp water. They don't grow that big anywhere but here. The argons must have something to do with it.

If you bring me some, I'll only let her eat a tiny sliver. I promise.
If there's a way to make these edible, we'll find it. That is not, however, something I'd wager on.
Have you located any hydraneas yet? They're really big and pinkâ€”you can't miss 'em.
